document.full_text: the 9.0 magnitude earthquake that ravaged japan also shortened earth's day by just over one-millionth of a second (1.8 microseconds to be exact), according to nasa. it also shifted the earth's axis by about 6.5 inches.
document.title: nasa: japan quake shortened earth's day, shifted axis
lines_and_colors: the 9.0 magnitude earthquake that ravaged japan also shortened earth's day by just over one-millionth of a second (1.8 microseconds to be exact), according to nasa. it also shifted the earth's axis by about 6.5 inches.
